whatIsTaxRefund.title: Tax Refund?
whatIsTaxRefund.description: A system that refunds the value-added tax (VAT) imposed on goods purchased by foreign tourists at tax refund shops, provided the goods are taken out of the country unused.
whatIsTaxRefund.lawDescription: Act on Restriction on Special Cases Concerning Taxation: A set of regulations on special cases concerning value-added taxes and individual consumption taxes for international tourists

eligibleItems.title: Who is eligible for a tax refund?

eligiblePersons.title: Eligible Persons
items: A non-resident of the Republic of Korea who has no income
Foreigners staying in Korea for up to 6 months (non-residents according to the Foreign Exchange Transactions Act)
An overseas Korean who has lived outside Korea for at least two years and is staying in Korea for less than three months (such as expatriates, students, workers, or trainees)

ineligiblePersons.title: Ineligible Persons
items: Overstayers (foreigners exceeding 6 months / Koreans exceeding 3 months)
Diplomats stationed in Korea (including equivalent foreign diplomatic staff)
Personnel and civilian employees of the UN and USFK
Employed individuals earning income in Korea

ineligibleNotices.title: Go to Refund Eligibility and Procedure Guide

features.title: Key Benefits
features.description: Introducing the features of our Tax Refund store service.

feature1.title: Increase in Sales from Foreign Tourists
feature1.description: Due to the discount effect of VAT refunds (6–8%), there is an increase in tourist visits, which also results in higher sales.

feature2.title: Promotable as a Tax Refund Store
description: Promotion as a tax refund store is possible through both online and offline channels.
In particular, awareness of the tax refund system is high among tourists from China, Japan, Taiwan, and Southeast Asia, leading to greater satisfaction when they visit the store.

feature3.title: No additional costs are incurred by affiliated stores.
feature3.description: Tax refund amount returned to customers is the VAT included in the product price, so the store does not bear any additional costs.

feature4.title: Service Available in All Stores Nationwide
description: Tax-free business operations are possible in any store nationwide that foreign tourists visit.
With price competitiveness equivalent to the refund amount compared to regular stores, it's advantageous for attracting customers.

applyRefund.title: Track and Submit for Tax Refund

uniqueId.title: Unique Identification Information Collection and Use Consent (Required)

notes.title: Notes
items: The actual refund amount may vary slightly due to exchange rates.
Once the refund application is completed, it cannot be modified. Please double-check the information you have entered.

goods.title: Goods
goods.description1: All goods except goods prohibited by law,
goods.description2: goods not visually verifiable, and duty-free goods

eligiblePerson.title: Eligible Persons
eligiblePerson.description: A non-resident of the Republic of Korea who has no income
eligibleList: Foreigners staying in Korea for up to 6 months
An overseas Korean who has lived outside Korea for at least two years and is staying in Korea for less than three months
ineligibleList: Persons staying beyond the allowed period, diplomats in Korea, USFK personnel, employees working in Korea, agents, corporations

eligibleItems.title: Eligible Goods
eligibleItems.description: Goods purchased from tax refund shops, except those prohibited by law
eligibleList: Single purchase amount of 15,000 KRW or more
Goods purchased within 3 months of departure and verified for export by customs authorities
ineligibleList: Goods that have been opened or used before being taken out of the country
Goods not confirmed for export by customs
Firearms, blades, explosives, cultural heritage, narcotics, and other items prohibited by law
Cooked food sold in restaurants, massage services, and items not visually verifiable by customs

medical.description1: Medical services received by international visitors
medical.description2: from medical service providers meeting the criteria

eligiblePerson.title: Eligible Persons
eligiblePerson.description: A non-resident of the Republic of Korea who has no income
eligibleList: Foreigners staying in Korea for up to 6 months
An overseas Korean who has lived outside Korea for at least two years and is staying in Korea for less than three months
ineligibleList: Persons staying beyond the allowed period, diplomats in Korea, USFK personnel, employees working in Korea, agents, corporations

eligibleItems.title: Eligible Medical Services
eligibleItems.description: Medical services subject to VAT provided to foreign tourists at designated medical institutions eligible for VAT refunds
eligibleList2: Nevus Pigmentosus, Freckle, Lentigo and Chloasma Treatment
ineligibleList: Medical services not meeting the criteria

accommodation.title: Accommodations
accommodation.description1: Accommodation services received by international visitors
accommodation.description2: at hospitality facilities meeting the criteria

eligiblePerson.title: Eligible Persons
eligiblePerson.description: A non-resident of the Republic of Korea who has no income
eligibleList: Foreigners staying in Korea for up to 6 months
An overseas Korean who has lived outside Korea for at least two years and is staying in Korea for less than three months
Visitors who leave Korea within 3 months of receiving accommodation services
ineligibleList: Persons staying beyond the allowed period, diplomats in Korea, USFK personnel, employees working in Korea, agents, corporations

eligibleItems.title: Eligible Accommodations
eligibleItems.description: Accommodation services provided to foreign tourists at VAT refund-eligible tourist accommodation facilities
eligibleList: Room charges for stays of 30 nights or less (including breakfast if included in the room rate)
For departures within 3 months after check out
ineligibleList: Separately purchased breakfast, service charges, or other additional fees

greeting.companyMission: First and foremost, we would like to extend our sincere gratitude to everyone who has shown interest in CubeRefund.
greeting.hello: CubeRefund was founded with the mission of providing innovative tax refund services to make shopping in Korea more convenient and enjoyable for international tourists.
greeting.globalPartnership: Since our establishment, we have grown into a company equipped with technological expertise and competitive services, thanks to investment and collaboration with LOTTE Innovate and Planet Payment Group Holdings, a global leader in tax refund services.
greeting.planet: Today, CubeRefund not only offers tax refund services but also delivers marketing solutions tailored to international tourists. Through this, we have positioned ourselves as a Value Creator, delivering real value to both customers and partners.
greeting.futureCommitment: Looking ahead, CubeRefund will continue to lead the way as a platform that enhances the shopping experience for international visitors and promotes the value of Korean brands on the global stage.
greeting.happy: We appreciate your continued interest and support as we innovate through technological advancement and customer-centered services to build a better tomorrow.

faq.question1: Who is eligible for a tax refund?
faq.answer1-1: Foreigners staying in Korea for less than 6 months, and Korean nationals who have lived abroad for more than 2 years and entered Korea for a short stay (within 3 months), are eligible for a tax refund. For more details, please check the link below.
faq.question2: What is the minimum purchase amount required for a tax refund?
faq.answer2-1: Tax refunds are available for purchases of 15,000 KRW or more per transaction.
faq.question3: Can I receive a refund with just the purchase receipt?
faq.answer3-1: Refunds cannot be processed with only a purchase receipt. You must receive a separate tax refund slip from a designated tax-free store in addition to your purchase receipt.
faq.question4: I hold a Korean passport. Am I eligible for a refund?
faq.answer4-1: For Korean nationals, only those who have lived abroad for more than 2 years and entered Korea for a short stay (within 3 months) are eligible for a tax refund.
faq.question5: Is a refund available only at the airport?
faq.answer5-1: In addition to airport refund counters, you can also receive refunds through downtown or mobile refund services. Using these services can save you time at the airport.
faq.answer5-2: However, you must still obtain customs export confirmation at departure. For more details, please check the link below.
faq.question6: Do I need customs export confirmation for refunds on medical or accommodation services?
faq.answer6-1: No, for medical or accommodation services, there are no goods to be exported, so you can receive your refund at the airport refund counter (or KIOSK) without customs export confirmation.
faq.answer6-2: ※ If you were unable to receive your refund at the airport, please write your passport information, date of birth, and email on the tax refund slip and place it in the mailbox.
faq.question7: I left the country without receiving a refund after reporting the customs withdrawal. Can I get a refund?
faq.answer7-1: Yes, it's possible. Please use the 'Search and Request Refunds' menu.
faq.question8: Can I get a refund because I couldn't report the customs withdrawal when I left the country?
faq.answer8-1: Confirmation of customs withdrawal is a prerequisite for refund processing. If you have not received customs clearance, you will not be able to receive a refund.
faq.answer8-2: However, you can get a refund if you report the customs withdrawal again when you re-enter and re-exit with the goods and refund slip within the validity period of the customs withdrawal.
faq.question9: Do I have to have the purchased items when I take them out to customs?
faq.answer9-1: You must have your purchased items with you when making a customs export declaration. If you wish to check in your items as baggage, please do so only after obtaining export confirmation from customs.
faq.question10: Where is the customs export declaration area at the departure port?
faq.answer10-1: The customs export declaration area varies by departure port. Please check the exact location for each port in the 'Tax Refund Locations.'
faq.question11: How can I inquire about becoming a CubeRefund member?
faq.answer11-1: Please call representative CubeRefund at +82-2-6925-2033 or use the 'Application & Inquiry' menu.
faq.question12: What should I do to update my business information?
faq.answer12-1: Please contact us via a 'Application & Inquiry' or get in touch with CubeRefund directly to make changes to your business information.
faq.question13: Do I need to purchase any equipment to use the tax refund service?
faq.answer13-1: After signing a partnership agreement with CubeRefund, we will provide and install the necessary terminals and equipment free of charge.
faq.question14: Are there any costs for using the tax refund service?
faq.answer14-1: There are no additional costs for using the tax refund service.
faq.question15: What are the benefits of becoming a tax refund affiliate store?
faq.answer15-1: The VAT refund discount attracts more tourists and increases sales. CubeRefund also supports various marketing activities targeting foreign tourists.
faq.question16: How is settlement processed after the VAT refund?
faq.answer16-1: A statement for monthly refunds will be emailed by the 2nd of the following month. After checking, please complete settlement by the end of the month.
faq.answer16-2: For quarterly/semi-annual VAT filings, the refund amount is reported at a zero tax rate, so there is no actual cost to the affiliate store.
faq.question17: Do I need to settle all tax refund receipts issued to foreign customers?
faq.answer17-1: No. Only completed refunds for foreign tourists need to be settled.
faq.answer17-2: Receipts that were issued but not refunded to the customer are not settled and must be reported as sales VAT.
faq.question18: What is the difference between Duty Free and Tax Refund?
faq.answer18-1: Duty Free means you purchase items with taxes already exempted, while Tax Refund means you pay the full price including taxes and receive a refund when you take the items out of the country upon departure.

instantRefundSection.title: Immediate Refund
instantRefundSection.tag: Eligible : Goods (Medical services and Accommodations are not eligible)
instantRefundSection.description: A system where the refund amount is deducted from the purchase price at the time of buying goods at a tax refund store

purchaseCriteria.title: Purchase requirements
purchaseCriteria.criteria1: Single purchase amount between 15,000 KRW and less than 1 million KRW.
purchaseCriteria.criteria2: Maximum total purchase amount eligible for Immediate Refund per person for each entry : KRW 5,000,000
purchaseCriteria.criteria3: If you do not have your passport or are not eligible for Immediate Refund, the Deferred Refund process will apply.
purchaseCriteria.criteria4: ※ Only stores equipped with Immediate Refund infrastructure, such as passport readers, are eligible.

refundMethod.title: Refund Method
refundMethod.method1: Pay the amount after the refund has been deducted and receive the tax refund slip.
refundMethod.method2: Customs real-time export approval in progress.

departureMethod.title: Departure Method
departureMethod.method: The customs export confirmation procedure is not necessary.

inCityRefundSection.title: Downtown Refund
inCityRefundSection.tag: Eligible : Goods, Medical services and Accommodations
inCityRefundSection.description: Collect your refund from an Downtown refund center or a KIOSK.

purchaseCriteria.title: Purchase Requirements
purchaseCriteria.criteria1: Each tax refund slip is valid for purchases of 15,000 KRW or more and up to 6,000,000 KRW.
purchaseCriteria.criteria2: No limit on the total purchase amount
purchaseCriteria.criteria3: Collect a tax refund slip at payment (tax refund cannot be claimed without the slip)

refundMethod.title: Refund Method
refundMethod.method: Bring your passport, tax refund slip, and credit card, and visit a downtown refund counter or self-service KIOSK.
refundMethod.method1: Receive your tax refund after presenting or scanning your passport and tax refund slip.

refundMeans.title: Issue of Refund
refundMeans.means1: Cash (a mandatory hold on a credit card at 115% of the refund applies)
refundMeans.means5: For Credit card, Alipay, and WeChat Pay refunds, the amount will be transferred to your designated account after customs export verification.

howToProceed.title: How to Proceed
howToProceed.method1: At departure, you must present your purchased items and passport to customs and have your tax refund slip confirmed for export. (However, customs export confirmation is not required for refunds on medical services and accommodation.)
howToProceed.method2: If goods are not taken out of the country, the security deposit will be charged to your credit card or the refund will be cancelled.

departureRequirements.title: Departure Requirements
departureRequirements.criteria1: You must have your goods confirmed for export or depart the country within 3 months from the date of tax refund slip issuance.

airportRefundSection.title: Departure Point Refund
airportRefundSection.tag: Eligible : Goods, Medical services and Accommodations
airportRefundSection.description: A system that allows you to receive your tax refund at a refund counter or KIOSK located at the airport upon departure.

purchaseRequirements.title: Purchase Requirements
purchaseRequirements.criteria1: Each tax refund slip is valid for purchases of 15,000 KRW.
purchaseRequirements.criteria3: Collect a tax refund slip at payment (tax refund cannot be claimed without the slip)

howToProceed.title: How to Proceed
howToProceed.method: At departure, you must present your purchased items and passport to customs and have your tax refund slip confirmed for export. (However, customs export confirmation is not required for refunds on medical services and accommodation.)

refundMethod.title: Refund Method
refundMethod.method: Receive your tax refund at a refund counter or self-service KIOSK located at the airport upon departure.
refundMethod.method1: Present or scan your passport and the tax refund slip with customs export confirmation to receive your refund.
refundMethod.method2: If there is no refund counter or self-service KIOSK at your departure terminal, please use the mailbox. (You must write your refund method and other required information on the tax refund slip.)

departureRequirements.title: Departure Requirements
departureRequirements.method: You must have your goods confirmed for export or depart the country within 3 months from the date of tax refund slip issuance.

mobileRefundSection.viewCubeQR: Apply for a refund via CUBE Mobile

mobileRefundSection.description: Claim your refund online before or after your departure from Korea.

howToProceed.method: At departure, you must present your purchased items and passport to customs and have your tax refund slip confirmed for export. (However, customs export confirmation is not required for refunds on medical services and accommodation.)

howToProceed.method: Use the CubeRefund website or Alipay app to request a tax

departureRequirements.criteria2: After customs export confirmation, the refund will be transferred to your designated account.

notice.description01: Other departure ports operate a mailbox system instead of a refund counter.If you wish to submit for a tax refund, please use the mailbox provided.

notice.description03: Ports with Mailbox Service : Incheon Port Terminal 2, Busan Port, Pyeongtaek Port, Gunsan Port, Sokcho Port

serialNo.label: Serial No.
serialNo.placeholder: Enter the serial number of your tax refund slip

noSlip.description: No matching tax refund slip found.

awaitingCustomsRelease.description: The slip has not yet been received by CubeRefund. We are currently verifying your customs export declaration.

refundAvailable.description: Customs export declaration or departure confirmation has been completed. Please proceed with your tax refund.

refundInProgress.description: Your tax refund application has been completed. Depending on the departure point, processing may take up to 2 months.

inCityRefundInProgress.description: Your tax refund application has been completed. The tax refund will be processed after customs export declaration.

refundComplete.description: Your Tax Refund has been completed.

refundImpossible.description: For credit card refunds, Korean-issued cards, AMEX cards, and debit cards are not eligible. For Alipay refunds, refunds cannot be processed via email address.

searchRefundSlip.noSlipFound: No tax refund slip found. Please check the serial number and the total payment amount on your tax refund slip.

notice.title: Notice
notice.item1: Tax refunds can only be requested for items that have been declared for export by Customs.
notice.item2: Tax refund requests are not accepted for purchases made more than 3 months ago.
notice.item3: Please make sure your refund slip has the CubeRefund logo.
notice.item4: The actual refund amount may vary slightly due to exchange rate fluctuations.
notice.item5: To apply for a refund, select the transaction and tap the Apply button.
notice.item6: For more information about your refund status, please contact CubeRefund Customer Service. (cube@cuberefund.com / +82-2-6925-2033)

notice.title: Notice
notice.item1: The actual refund amount may differ slightly depending on the exchange rate.
notice.item2: Please note that once your refund application has been submitted, it cannot be modified.Be sure to double-check the information you have entered before submitting your application.

notice.title: Notice
notice.item1: For more details about the status of your application, please contact the CubeRefund Service Center.

fairTrade.title: Compliance
fairTrade.description1: All business practices are conducted with ethics as the highest priority, ensuring transparency and compliance with the law.
fairTrade.description2: Our policies guide all employees in understanding and upholding ethical standards.

ethicsNewspaper.title: About the Ombudsman?
ethicsNewspaper.description: The Ombudsman of CubeRefund is here to receive reports of instances running counter to CubeRefund's business ethics, such as abuse of powers for personal gains or a third party's gains, violations of internal financial policies, sexual harassment, corruption, bullying, and neglect of corporate social responsibility.The Ombudsman of CubeRefund is here to receive reports of instances running counter to CubeRefund's business ethics, such as abuse of powers for personal gains or a third party's gains, violations of internal financial policies, sexual harassment, corruption, bullying, and neglect of corporate social responsibility.
ethicsNewspaper.notice: We welcome your feedback and reports.

corruption.title: Corruption
corruption.description: Unfair and unacceptable practices in business (examples: unfair promotions or dismissals, giving or taking of bribes)

humanRights.title: Human Rights in the Workplace
humanRights.description: Sexual harassment, bullying, and other instances creating conflict among employees

ethicsViolation.title: Trade Ethics
ethicsViolation.description: Losses incurred in transactions with CubeRefund due to unethical practices

complaints.title: Complaints
complaints.description: Feedback on improving efficiency and business ethics

accountingFraud.title: Finances
accountingFraud.description: Unfair or unacceptable practices of employees in internal finances

codeViolation.title: Code of Ethics
codeViolation.description: Violations of CubeRefund's Code of Ethics

reception.title: Submission of report
reception.description: A report is submitted through the Ombudsman webpage.

verification.title: Review of report
verification.description: The report is reviewed internally. The reporter's identity is kept confidential.

investigation.title: Investigation
investigation.description: Investigation plans are formed and implemented. The investigation period depends on the subject and range of investigation.

completion.title: Completion of investigations
completion.description: Investigations are completed when the veracity of the report is confirmed by evidence.

conclusion.title: Closure
conclusion.description: Disciplinary action is executed according to internal policy.

result.title: Notification of outcome
result.description: Excluding instances where the due rights and interests of CubeRefund can be infringed, the outcome of the submitted report is notified.

protection.title: We Protect You
protection.description: Reporters remain 100% anonymous. We make sure no reporters are subjected to disadvantages for making reports.

items.security: Submitted reports and ensuing investigations are kept confidential. Identifying information of reporters and stakeholders is protected. Please do not make false reports of a malicious nature.
items.evidence: Evidence provided by the reporter; information collected through investigations
items.followUp: Actions taken as a result of a report

items.investigation: Investigations take place if a submitted report is factual and detailed.
items.confidentiality: The reporter's identity and reported information are kept strictly confidential. The Ombudsman system is protected with security measures. The handling of reports is reserved for persons sworn to confidentiality.
items.reasonableHandling: All extenuating circumstances are taken into consideration when a reporter reports their own wrongdoing.

guide.title: Submitting a Report
guide.security: CubeRefund's Ombudsman system is protected with security technology. If you submit a report anonymously, your identity remains anonymous.
guide.content: Investigations may not take place if a submitted report lacks facts and details.
guide.response: If you submit a report in your name, you will receive a response by email. The response can also be viewed by logging in through the "Progress on Your Report" tab with your ID and password.

inProgress.description: Based on the report, we are currently checking the content and conducting an investigation in accordance with the investigation plan.

service1.title: Extensive Experience and Expertise in Tax Refund Services Across a Wide Range of Industries and Business Sizes.
service1.desc1: Tax refund services are available for eligible retail, medical, and accommodation sectors in Korea.
service1.desc2: Tax refund services are available to a wide range of businesses, from small shops to large stores such as department stores.

service2.title: Professional Support for Opening Tax Refund Stores
service2.desc1: If necessary, we offer support for the application procedure to become a designated tax refund store.
service2.desc2: We offer complimentary provision and installation of all essential tax refund equipment at your store, such as dedicated terminals, software, and passport readers.

service3.title: Reliable Operations Support by Experts
service3.desc1: A dedicated representative for each store offers free maintenance and support for tax refund equipment nationwide, including servicing and consumables.
service3.desc2: Our professional consultants promptly respond to all tax refund-related inquiries from your store.
service3.desc3: We provide quarterly transaction reports to facilitate easy VAT filing.

service4.title: Sales Reports for Foreign Tourists
service4.desc: We provide data on foreign tourist sales and inbound tourist trends to help you forecast demand and plan promotional activities.

service5.title: Marketing Support for Attracting Foreign Tourists
service5.desc: We provide promotion and marketing support through various marketing channels by CubeRefund.

service6.title: Reliable IT System Operations
service6.desc: Through our enterprise-grade data centers, we ensure the highest level of security and deliver continuous, stable service performance.

step1.title: Sign a Partner Agreement with CubeRefund
step1.description: Contact CubeRefund to become a partner (+82-2-6925-2033)

goods.title: Sign a Partner Agreement with CubeRefund
goods.description: Apply to register as tax-refundable business serving international visitors with your local tax office
goods.subDescription: CubeRefund can apply on your behalf
goods.link: Apply to register as tax-refundable business serving international visitors

medical.title: Register with the Korea Health Industry Development Institute
medical.description: Apply to register as a medical service provider to foreign patients with the Korea Health Industry Development Institute
medical.link: Apply to register as a medical service provider to foreign patients

accommodation.title: Application for Special Application Tourist Accommodation Facilities
accommodation.description: Apply to the Korea Hotel Association or the Korea Resort Condominium Management Association

links.condo: The Korea Resort Condominium Management Association

step3.title: Launch of Tax Refund Service
step3.description: Installation and training of tax refund equipment
step3.subDescription: Free provision of terminals and necessary items

intro.paragraph1: Cuberefund Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as the "Company") highly values the protection of users' personal information and is committed to ensuring that personal information provided online while using the Company's services is protected. The Company complies with the "Act on Promotion of Information and Communications Network Utilization and Information Protection, etc." and the "Personal Information Protection Act," and has established a privacy policy to do its best to protect user rights.

mainPoints.title: Key Privacy Policy Points

item2.alt: Purpose of processing personal information icon
item2.title: Purpose of Processing Personal Information
item2.description: General inquiries, refund processing, ombudsman, etc.

item3.title: Retention Period
item3.description: Until termination of service use agreement. However, records of contracts, withdrawals, payments, and supply of goods in e-commerce: 5 years.

item4.title: Destruction Procedure
item4.description: Immediate destruction after the retention period based on collection consent.

item5.title: Security Measures
item5.description: Training for employees handling personal information, installation of security programs, etc.

mainPoints.itemNote: ※ Please check the main text of the Privacy Policy for details.

contentsOverview.title: The privacy policy for Cuberefund's website internet services includes the following:
contentsOverview.item1: 1. Purpose of Collection and Use of Personal Information
contentsOverview.item2: 2. Items and Methods of Collecting Personal Information
contentsOverview.item3: 3. Processing and Retention Period of Personal Information
contentsOverview.item4: 4. Matters Concerning Provision of Personal Information
contentsOverview.item5: 5. Rights and Obligations of Data Subjects and Legal Representatives, and How to Exercise Them
contentsOverview.item6: 6. Procedure and Method for Destroying Personal Information
contentsOverview.item7: 7. Measures to Ensure Personal Information Security
contentsOverview.item8: 8. Affiliation/Name and Contact Information of the Personal Information Manager and Officer for the Service

section1.title: 1. Purpose of Collection and Use of Personal Information
section1.paragraph1: The Company processes personal information for the following purposes. Personal information being processed will not be used for purposes other than those stated, and if the purpose of use changes, necessary measures such as obtaining separate consent will be taken in accordance with Article 18 of the Personal Information Protection Act.
section1.subPointA: A. Provision of domestic tax refund services, including issuance of refund slips
section1.subPointB: B. Merchant registration, service provision, and maintenance

section2.title: 2. Items and Methods of Collecting Personal Information
section2.paragraph1: The Company collects and uses personal information within the minimum scope necessary for service provision in accordance with the Personal Information Protection Act.

subSection2_1.title: 2-1. Personal Information Items Processed Without Consent of the Data Subject
subSection2_1.paragraph1: - The Company processes the following personal information items without the data subject's consent based on Article 15, Paragraph 1, Item 4 (execution of contract) of the Personal Information Protection Act.

subSection2_2.title: 2-2. Personal Information Items Processed With Consent of the Data Subject
subSection2_2.paragraph1: - The Company collects the following personal information based on the Personal Information Protection Act below.

subSection2_3.title: 2-3. Methods of Collecting Personal Information
subSection2_3.item1: - When the data subject consents to the processing of personal information and directly inputs it during merchant registration and service use.
subSection2_3.item2: - When the data subject directly provides personal information through the website, phone, etc., during consultation via customer center.
subSection2_3.item3: - When personal information is received from a third party contracted with Cuberefund (In such cases, the third party obtains consent for providing personal information from the data subject before providing it to Cuberefund, in accordance with the Personal Information Protection Act).
subSection2_3.item4: - When IP address, cookies, service usage records, device information, and transaction history are automatically or manually generated and collected during service use.

subSection2_4.title: 2-4. The following information may be generated and collected during service use:
subSection2_4.item1: - Service usage records, access logs, cookies, access IP information

subItemA.title: A. Collection Methods
subItemA.paragraph1: - The Company collects personal information through the following methods:
subItemA.point1: Cuberefund website, Cuberefund refund system, merchant management system

subItemB.title: B. Installation, Operation, and Refusal of Automatic Personal Information Collection Devices
subItemB.paragraph1: - The Company uses 'cookies' that store and frequently retrieve usage information to provide users with improved services.
subItemB.paragraph2: - Cookies are small pieces of information sent by the server (http) operating the website to the user's computer browser and may be stored on the user's PC hard disk.
subItemB.point1: Purpose of using cookies: Used as a basis for providing optimized information to users by identifying visit and usage patterns, search terms, security access status, etc., for each service and website visited by the user.
subItemB.point2: Installation, operation, and refusal of cookies: You can refuse to store cookies through option settings in Tools > Internet Options > Privacy menu at the top of your web browser.

row1.col3: Name, contact, email, account number, address

row1.col1: Personal Information Protection Act Article 24, Paragraph 1, Item 1 (Unique Identification Information)

row2.col1: Personal Information Protection Act Article 15, Paragraph 1, Item 1 (Consent)
row2.col3: Contact, email, passport name, nationality, date of birth, credit card number

section3.title: 3. Processing and Retention Period of Personal Information
section3.paragraph1: The Company processes and retains personal information within the retention/use period agreed upon at the time of collection from the data subject or within the retention/use period stipulated by law.
section3.subPointA: A. Domestic tax refund: Until termination of service use agreement or merchant registration, provided that if debt/credit relationships remain, until such relationships are settled.
section3.subPointB: B. Records of contracts, withdrawals, payments, and supply of goods in e-commerce: 5 years.

subPointC.title: C. Cookie Information
subPointC.item1: - Retention items: Computer communication, internet log records, access point tracking data
subPointC.item2: - Retention basis: Storage of communication fact confirmation data according to Article 15-2 of the 「Communications Secret Protection Act」

section4.title: 4. Matters Concerning Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties
section4.paragraph1: The Company uses users' personal information within the scope notified in "1. Purpose of Collection and Use of Personal Information" and does not use it beyond this scope or, in principle, disclose/provide users' personal information to external parties without prior consent.

row3.col1: Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism
row3.col2: Passport information (passport number, name, nationality, date of birth)

row4.col2: Passport information (passport number, name, nationality, date of birth)

row5.col1: LOTTE Card, VISA, Master, JCB, UnionPay, Global Tax Free
row5.col4: Until the period based on relevant laws and agreements

section5.title: 5. Rights and Obligations of Data Subjects and Legal Representatives, and How to Exercise Them

subPointA.title: A. The data subject may exercise the following personal information protection rights against the Company at any time:
subPointA.item2: Request for correction if there are errors, etc.

section5.subPointB: B. The rights under paragraph A can be exercised by contacting the personal information protection officer and responsible department or the Company in writing, by phone, email, fax, etc., and the Company will take action without delay.
section5.subPointC: C. If the data subject requests correction or deletion of errors in personal information, the Company will not use or provide the personal information until the correction or deletion is completed.
section5.subPointD: D. The rights under paragraph A can be exercised through a legal representative of the data subject or an authorized agent. In this case, a power of attorney according to Appendix Form No. 11 of the Notification on Personal Information Processing Methods must be submitted.

section6.title: 6. Procedure and Method for Destroying Personal Information
section6.paragraph1: The Company destroys the relevant personal information without delay when it becomes unnecessary, such as due to the expiration of the retention period or achievement of the processing purpose.

subPointA.title: A. Destruction Procedure
subPointA.item1: Information entered by the user is destroyed immediately after the retention period based on collection consent. However, if storage is required by other laws, it is stored for a certain period in a separate DB (or separate documents for paper) and is not used for other purposes. (Refer to '3. Processing and Retention Period of Personal Information')

subPointB.title: B. Destruction Method
subPointB.item1: Personal information printed on paper is shredded or incinerated.
subPointB.item2: Personal information stored in electronic file format is deleted using a technical method that makes records unrecoverable.

section7.title: 7. Measures to Ensure Personal Information Security
section7.paragraph1: The Company takes the following measures to ensure the security of personal information:

item1.title: Training for employees handling personal information
item1.description: Employees handling personal information are designated and limited to a minimum, and compliance with the privacy policy is always emphasized through regular training for these employees.

subPointB.title: B. Technical Measures
subPointB.item1: To prevent leakage and damage of personal information due to hacking or computer viruses, security programs are installed and periodically updated/checked, and systems are installed in areas with controlled external access, with technical/physical monitoring and blocking.

subPointC.title: C. Physical Measures
subPointC.item1: Access control for unauthorized persons: A separate physical storage location for personal information is maintained, and access control procedures are established and operated.

section8.title: 8. Matters Concerning the Personal Information Protection Officer of the Service
section8.paragraph1: The Company has designated a personal information protection officer as follows to be responsible for overall personal information processing tasks and to handle complaints and damage relief for data subjects related to personal information processing.
section8.paragraph2: Users can report all personal information protection-related complaints arising from using the Company's services to the personal information manager or the responsible department. The Company will provide prompt and sufficient answers to users' reports. If you need to report or consult about other personal information infringements, please contact the institutions below.
section8.externalContact1: Personal Information Infringement Report Center: privacy.kisa.or.kr (Dial 118 without area code)
section8.externalContact2: Supreme Prosecutors' Office Cyber Investigation Division: www.spo.go.kr (Dial 1301 without area code)
section8.externalContact3: National Police Agency Cyber Bureau: https://ecrm.police.go.kr/ (Dial 182 without area code)

section9.title: 9. Duty of Notification
section9.paragraph1: If there are additions, deletions, or modifications to the current privacy policy, they will be notified through the 'Notices' section of the website at least 7 days before the revision.
